title: Minimal Permanent Cropland
description: In 2022, only 0.34% of Mongolia's land area was dedicated to permanent cropland, one of the lowest percentages globally, highlighting limited agricultural land use.

title: Negative Financial Asset Acquisition
description: Mongolia experienced a net acquisition of financial assets at -6.44% of GDP in 2021, indicating a significant reduction in financial assets relative to its GDP.

title: Low Tuberculosis Detection Rate
description: In 2023, Mongolia's tuberculosis case detection rate was only 18%, one of the lowest globally, suggesting challenges in identifying and treating TB cases.

title: High Export Dependency on East Asia & Pacific
description: By 2023, 91.71% of Mongolia's merchandise exports were directed towards low- and middle-income economies in East Asia & Pacific, indicating a strong regional trade focus.
